text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱفْعَلُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ ۩

translation.en.sahih: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
translation.id.indonesian: Hai orang-orang yang beriman, ruku'lah kamu, sujudlah kamu, sembahlah Tuhanmu dan perbuatlah kebajikan, supaya kamu mendapat kemenangan.
